reviewText: I love learning with my granddaughter

Have all the DVDs they have they are great for teaching your kids or small group, hearing or not hearing. Teaching ASL to kids stops the crying, tantrums and the like along with teaching them a second language.  I have taught both my kids both are hearing children.  My 2 year old already has over a 400 word vocabulary in ASL and has only been learning for 6 months as its currently his only way to communicate due to a bilateral cleft lip and palate.
